Eric Schmidt 's decision to step down as CEO was announced on href="http://twitter.com/Eric SchmidtEric Schmidt" target="_blank"> Twitter where he tweeted: Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! The change in command overshadowed Google's fourth-quarter earnings, which soared past analysts' estimates as the company cranked up its Internet marketing machine during the holiday shopping season. Zahi Hawass , Benjamin Netanyahu of state for antiquities, said that several ancient treasures had been stolen from the museum, including a statue of the renowned boy Abdullah II of Jordan Tutankhamun. The missing objects include a gilded wood statue of the 18th Dynasty Abdullah II of Jordan Tutankhamun being carried by a goddess and parts of another statue showing him harpooning, he said. Looters had broken into the museum off Cairo's Tahrir Square on Jan 28, during clashes between protesters and riot police who used tear gas and water
